info.name: Caspio Pricing Proxy API - Complete & Organized
info.description: Comprehensive, professionally organized collection of all 67 endpoints for the Caspio Pricing Proxy API. Updated after server refactoring with proper folder structure and all missing endpoints included.

item.name: üè• System & Health

request.description: Returns the status of the proxy server and the configured Caspio domain.
Basic test endpoint to verify server is responding.
Test endpoint to fetch a limited number of records from the SanMar bulk data table.

item.description: System health checks and testing endpoints

item.name: üõçÔ∏è Products & Catalog

query.description: Search term for style number (minimum 2 characters)

request.description: Performs style search for autocomplete functionality. Requires 'term' parameter with minimum 2 characters.
Fetches comprehensive product details for a given style number.
Fetches unique color swatches for a specific style number.
Fetches detailed color information including images and descriptions.
Performs general search across multiple product fields.
Fetches essential product details for quick view popup.
Fetches all unique brand names with sample styles.
Fetches all unique category names.
Fetches all unique subcategory names.
Fetches subcategories for a specific category.
Fetches products from a specific brand.
Fetches products from a specific category.
Fetches products from a specific subcategory.
Fetches products matching both category and subcategory.
Advanced filtering with multiple criteria.
Fetches products marked as 'New' or featured.

query.description: Style number of the reference product

request.description: Fetches products related to a given style.
Fetches details for multiple products for comparison.
Fetches personalized product recommendations.

item.description: Complete product catalog functionality including search, filtering, and discovery

item.name: üí∞ Pricing & Costs

request.description: Fetches pricing tiers for a specific decoration method.
Fetches pricing rules for a decoration method.
Fetches all DTG (Direct to Garment) printing costs.
Fetches embroidery costs based on item type and stitch count.
Fetches screenprint costs for primary or additional locations.
Fetches base costs for all sizes of a product.
Fetches detailed pricing by size for a product.
Fetches maximum prices for multiple styles.

item.description: Comprehensive pricing and cost calculation endpoints

item.name: üõí Cart & Sessions

request.description: Fetches cart sessions with optional filtering.
Creates a new cart session.
Updates an existing cart session.
Deletes a cart session.
Fetches cart items with optional filtering.
Adds a new item to the cart.
Updates an existing cart item.
Removes an item from the cart.

query.description: Cart Item ID to filter by (optional)

request.description: Fetches size details for cart items.
Adds size and quantity details to a cart item.
Updates size details for a cart item.
Removes a size entry from a cart item.
Processes checkout by converting cart items to an order.

item.description: Complete shopping cart functionality with sessions, items, sizes, and checkout

item.name: üì¶ Orders & Customers

request.description: Fetches orders with optional filtering.
Creates a new order.
Updates an existing order.
Deletes an order.
Fetches customers with optional filtering.
Creates a new customer.
Updates an existing customer.
Deletes a customer.

item.description: Order management and customer database operations

item.name: üí° Quotes & Analytics

request.description: Fetches quote analytics events.
Fetches a specific quote analytics record.
Creates a new quote analytics event.
Updates an existing quote analytics record.
Deletes a quote analytics record.
Fetches quote items with optional filtering.
Fetches a specific quote item.
Creates a new quote item.
Updates an existing quote item.
Deletes a quote item.
Fetches quote sessions with optional filtering.
Fetches a specific quote session.
Creates a new quote session.
Updates an existing quote session.
Deletes a quote session.

item.description: Complete quote management system with analytics, items, and session tracking

item.name: üì¶ Inventory & Stock

request.description: Fetches inventory levels for a specific style and optional color.
Fetches detailed size availability and inventory by warehouse.

item.description: Inventory management and stock level checking

item.name: üîß Pricing Matrix

request.description: Fetches pricing matrix records with optional filtering.
Looks up a pricing matrix ID based on style, color, and embellishment type.
Fetches a specific pricing matrix by ID.
Creates a new pricing matrix.
Updates an existing pricing matrix.
Deletes a pricing matrix.

item.description: Dynamic pricing matrix management and lookup functionality

item.name: üìé Utilities & Integration

request.description: Serves the JavaScript file for client-side cart integration.

item.description: Utility endpoints for integration and client-side functionality
